column1: In the Austrian Empire and Austria-Hungary
column2: Prostějov was part of the Margraviate of Moravia. In 1918
column3: it became part of independent Czechoslovakia. The period of German occupation lasted from March 1939 until May 1945. During this time
column4: Prostějov was administered as a part of the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia.
